rows.label: bf11330100_0010
rows.name:
I apologize for having
you all gather here.

rows.label: bf11330100_0020
rows.name:
The truth is, there is something
I must inform Adel of.

rows.label: bf11330100_0060
rows.name:
It's a ragtag group of refugees who lost their homes
and defeated soldiers from all over the place.

rows.label: bf11330100_0070
rows.name: We started it in Invidia, but...

rows.label: bf11330100_0080
rows.name:
According to a report that just
came in, they've left Invidia.

rows.label: bf11330100_0090
rows.name:
What? But why? We don't
even know where Metsu is.

rows.label: bf11330100_0100
rows.name:
Apparently, Invidia has
absorbed them and...

rows.label: bf11330100_0110
rows.name:
Looks like they were planning to use them as a
foreign legion to defend their own country.

rows.label: bf11330100_0120
rows.name:
I thought I had come to an agreement
with the King of Invidia...

rows.label: bf11330100_0130
rows.name:
Per His Majesty's orders, we're tracking
the resistance army's movements.

rows.label: bf11330100_0140
rows.name: Right now, they're on their way to Iira.

rows.label: bf11330100_0150
rows.name:
We've set things up so we can
contact them whenever we need to.

rows.label: bf11330100_0170
rows.name:
When they land in Iira,
have them head to Aletta.
